真面目なことを書くと約四年間もやっててたまに他のゲームに浮気したりしますがこのゲームに戻ってきてしまいます。神ゲーです。夜は本当にマッチングが長いので友達とやることをおすすめします

muy bueno

Overall really fun. Can be fun solo, but definitely better to play with friends. Pretty easy to pick up and learn. Also has a few guides that teach you how to play the game. The game gives you the ability to have your own play style (although you might hear about it in the chat afterwards). I have had my fair share of toxic community members, but I feel like that's common in online matchmaking games nowadays. Another plus for me is there are tons of cosmetics to earn/buy.
Me gusta mucho el juego, lo jugaba mucho desde el movil, pero creo que ya es hora e una actualizacion, o una nueva version mejorada.
Buen juego, lastima los bugs jeje
I have no idea why I can't stop playing this game even when I am absolute garbage at it sometimes.

I cant really recommend this game, mainly because of many smallish issues the game has like being buggy from time to time.
 ̶T̶h̶e̶r̶e̶ ̶i̶s̶ ̶a̶l̶s̶o̶ ̶t̶h̶e̶ ̶f̶a̶c̶t̶ ̶B̶H̶V̶R̶ ̶j̶u̶s̶t̶ ̶d̶o̶e̶s̶n̶'̶t̶ ̶w̶a̶n̶t̶ ̶t̶o̶ ̶b̶a̶l̶a̶n̶c̶e̶ ̶p̶e̶r̶k̶s̶ ̶t̶h̶a̶t̶ ̶n̶e̶e̶d̶ ̶i̶t̶,̶ ̶w̶h̶e̶t̶h̶e̶r̶ ̶t̶h̶a̶t̶ ̶b̶e̶ ̶n̶e̶r̶f̶i̶n̶g̶ ̶p̶e̶r̶k̶s̶ ̶o̶r̶ ̶b̶u̶f̶f̶i̶n̶g̶ ̶o̶n̶e̶s̶ ̶t̶h̶a̶t̶ ̶d̶e̶s̶p̶e̶r̶a̶t̶e̶l̶y̶ ̶n̶e̶e̶d̶ ̶i̶t̶. It's actually interesting to see the new shake up with the perks, while yes they were a bit heavy handed with some and barely touched others overall the new changes in general are nice to see, finally away from the same 4 perks every game (at least for now). Oh, and some killers still kinda need some tweaking.

I still think the skill based matchmaking is awful play with, still getting a decent game or two only to get the someone or a group of people outside your skill level the next game.
Plenty more complains about recent events and game play stuff but to lazy to write about it all.

6 / 10 still cant really recommend this game.

this game is not an L, better than rust, except for nemises, fuck nemises, also i dont like wraith, fuck wraith actually, oh and ruin is too strong so fuck that too, oh wait facecamping is a thing fuck that too actually, oh excuse me for my cumbersome actions, i am forgetting about bad hit reg, fuck bad hit reg, actually pig is too weak needs buffed, so fuck behavior, but wait jane romero doesnt have a bikini skin so the game is automatically shit, wait ohmwrecker plays this game, so actually this game is pretty mid, oh shit on a stick, i forgot about playing solo q survivor so this game is pretty shit seriously, i do like the jiggle physics on clowns big ass, sexy, abhorrently beautiful belly,  so that makes up for everything, this game is actually pretty good! :)

È um jogo muito bom e divertido, mas eu queria entender qual o problema de algumas pessoas que jogam esse jogo, pra vir comentar algo no seu perfil devido a sua performance.. Se você fica ofendido com as mecânicas que o jogo oferece, como balançar a cabeça ou dar "t-bag",  Pau no seu cu amigo. Procure um psicologo pq nìnguem merece ter que aguentar o seu chororo.
El juego esta muy entretenido, jugarlo con amigos es clave. Los desarolladores le ponen muchas ganas para ajustar la jugabilidad y sacar nuevos personajes

Um excelente jogo, mas possui diversos bugs. É muito comum em partidas em que o ping esta um pouco acima do normal ocorrer diversos teleportes ou hits extremamente sem sentido principalmente contra um freddy, atualmente esta com um bug de atravessar palets e portas que já haviam sido quebradas, mesmo sendo apenas um bug visual atrapalha muito a gameplay.
